diagnoses: Pneumonia with systemic inflammatory response syndrome (SIRS)
info:Group of disorders that cause overproduction of blood cells
including polycythemia vera which increases red blood cells. Can cause symptoms like bloating and diarrhea.}
info:Disorder affecting the large intestine that can cause bloating
and changes in bowel habits like diarrhea.}
info:Inflammation of the stomach and intestines
info:Autoimmune disorder triggered by gluten causing intestinal damage and symptoms like diarrhea
info:Difficulty digesting certain foods or immune reaction to foods
potentially causing GI symptoms like bloating and diarrhea.}
info:Includes Crohns disease and ulcerative colitis. Causes chronic inflammation in the GI tract and symptoms like diarrhea and bloating.}
info:Excessive bacteria in the small intestine
info:Abnormal closing of the vocal cords that can mimic laryngitis symptoms like hoarseness and difficulty speaking.}
info:Condition involving sensitivity to chemicals in the environment
with wide-ranging symptoms that may include chemical sensitivities.}
info:Disorder involving overaccumulation of mast cells that can affect multiple body systems and cause chemical sensitivities
